strings.home.headline: Welcome to Axum Web Server
strings.home.subheading: A modern Rust web server with Axum and HTMX
strings.home.feature1_desc: Built with Rust for maximum performance and reliability.
strings.home.feature2_desc: Utilizes HTMX for seamless interactivity without complex JavaScript.
strings.home.feature3_desc: Supports multiple languages with easy switching.
